body: Tasks:-market research and conception planning for introduction of new products-customer acquisition by telephone, research and qualification of customer data-monitor market and competitors product lines, activities-up to date market price information-technical support for the customers-regularly carries out product trainings for the field sales engineers-creating technical articles, advertisements-website management-order processing and management in SAP systemExpectations:-Technical University degree (electro technical, automation)-2-3 year working experiences in same position-strong technical and sales approach-good communication skills-team player-accept responsibility-flexible with time-fluent written and verbal Hungarian, good English-IT and SAP KnowledgeWe offer you:A pleasant and friendly work environment among a team of dynamic and high-performance oriented people;The opportunity to work and develop knowledge in a professional environment.
title: SALES SUPPORT ENGINEER  (Hungarian / English)
